# NineScrolls

> Research‑grade semiconductor equipment provider. We build plasma etching systems (RIE/ICP) and thin‑film deposition systems (ALD, PECVD, HDP‑CVD), with documentation, service & warranty information. This file gives LLMs a concise, linkable map of high‑value resources.

NineScrolls serves universities, institutes, and corporate R&D labs. For questions or corrections, contact info@ninescrolls.com. Canonical host is https://ninescrolls.com/.

## Docs

- [Sitemap](https://ninescrolls.com/sitemap.xml): Index of public pages
- [Robots](https://ninescrolls.com/robots.txt): Crawl rules
- [Service Process Guide (PDF)](https://ninescrolls.com/docs/NineScrolls_Service_Process_Guide.pdf): Warranty / service overview

## Products

- [Products overview](https://ninescrolls.com/products/): Equipment categories and links
- [RIE Etcher](https://ninescrolls.com/products/rie-etcher): Reactive ion etching systems
- [ICP Etcher](https://ninescrolls.com/products/icp-etcher): Inductively coupled plasma etching
- [ALD Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/ald): Atomic layer deposition
- [PECVD Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/pecvd): Plasma‑enhanced CVD
- [HDP‑CVD Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/hdp-cvd): High‑density plasma CVD
- [IBE/RIBE Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/ibe-ribe): Ion/Reactive ion beam etching
- [Sputter Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/sputter): PVD sputtering
- [Striper Systems](https://ninescrolls.com/products/striper): Photoresist removal
- [Coater/Developer](https://ninescrolls.com/products/coater-developer): Photolithography track

## Insights

- [Plasma etching fundamentals](https://ninescrolls.com/insights/plasma-etching): Overview & key terms
- [Plasma cleaning](https://ninescrolls.com/insights/plasma-cleaning-precision-surface-preparation): Surface preparation

## Service & Company

- [Service & Support](https://ninescrolls.com/service-support): Warranty, AMC packages, process
- [Contact](https://ninescrolls.com/contact): Quotes and technical questions
- [About](https://ninescrolls.com/about): Company information

## Optional

- [Equipment Guide (PDF)](https://ninescrolls.com/equipment-guide.pdf): Downloadable brochure
